participant_1.background:
My family is always there for me, and I do my best to be there for them too.
i am a student at a small community college.
i m allergic to shellfish.
i love to read romance novels.
I'm so excited to start my new life in San Diego, and I'm so grateful for my family's support.

participant_2.background:
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
my name is dave.
my family is very supportive of my skiing.
I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.

content.text: Hello! I am new in San Diego. What is your name?
Hello! I am Dave, and I have been in San Diego for about 3 years.
Oh cool! I just moved here to start school.
Oh wow, that is exciting! What are you studying?
I am studying business administration at the local community college.
Oh nice! I am a software engineer for a small company in San Diego.
Oh wow! That sounds really interesting.
It is, but it can be a lot of work.
I am sure it is. I am excited to start my new life here.
I am sure you will do great! San Diego is a great city.
Thank you! I am looking forward to exploring it.
There is a lot to do here. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, and I am also learning to ski.
Oh nice! I used to ski when I was younger, but I haven't done it in a while.
You should come with me sometime! I would love to have a skiing buddy.
That would be fun! I will let you know when I have some time.
Awesome! I am looking forward to it.
